solidstack.query
Class QueryLoader

java.lang.Object
  solidstack.query.QueryLoader

public class QueryLoader
extends Object

Reads, compiles and caches the queries.

Author:
René M. de Bloois

Method Detail

setTemplatePath

public void setTemplatePath(String path)
Configures the path which acts as the root of the template files.

Parameters:
path - The path.

setReloading

public void setReloading(boolean reloading)
Enable or disable reloading. When enabled, the lastModified time stamp of the file is used to check if it needs reloading.

Parameters:
reloading - When true, the file is reloaded when updated.

setDefaultLanguage

public void setDefaultLanguage(String language)
Sets the default scripting language of the templates. The default scripting language is used when a "language" directive is missing in the template.

Parameters:
language - The default scripting language of the templates.

getQuery

public Query getQuery(String path)
Returns a Query.

Parameters:
path - The path of the query relative to the configured root package.
Returns:
The Query.
